body_html: Yes, I've already called cusparseDcsrmm2 from <cusparse.h> in another funtion in the same file and everything worked well. (But the result was in Fortran-style ordering, and I don't know how to transfer it back to C-style one.)

body: Yes, I've already called cusparseDcsrmm2 from <cusparse.h> in another funtion in the same file and everything worked well. (But the result was in Fortran-style ordering, and I don't know how to transfer it back to C-style one.)
